item.title: New site is live!
item.description: I’ve finally finished most of the customizations I want for my new site! The template is based off the Erblog Hugo template, though (of course) with a lot of under the hood modifications. I also finalized my CV which was made using the Orbit theme. For future reference (for both you and me), here’s a Markdown demo showing how various elements are rendered. Over the next few weeks, I plan to post various projects/demos relating to statistics on this page.

item.title: Markdown Demo
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
